<script>
    var myMath = {
        PI: 3.14159265358979,
        max: function() {
            var max = arguments[0];
            for(var i = 1; i < arguments.length; i++){
                if(arguments[i] > max){
                    max = arguments[i];
                }
            }return max;
        },
        min: function(){
            var min = arguments[0];
            for(var i = 1; i < arguments.length;i++){
                if(arguments[i] < min){
                    min = arguments[i];
                }
            }return min;
        }
    }
    console.log(myMath.PI);
    console.log(myMath.max(1,2,3,3,6,90));
    console.log(myMath.min(12,323,34,5,6));
    </script>

    function getRandomIntInclusive(min, max) {

 <script>
